publication.title: Storage challenge - HUSt: a heterogeneous unified storage system for GIS grid
publication.authors: lingfang zeng,ke zhou,zhan shi,dan feng,fang wang,chang-sheng xie,zhitang li,zhanwu yu,jianya gong,qiang cao,zhongying niu,lingjun qin,qun liu
publication.keyword: Data Gathering;Geographic Information System;High Performance;Next Generation Internet;Spatial Information;Storage System;Virtual Interface;
publication.abstract: Geographic Information System Grid integrates geographic information systems and Grid technology for data gathering, accessing, transmitting and service, in different I/O patterns, built upon massive storage systems. Existing non-standardized multi-source and multi-scale data lack spatial information sharing either internally or externally between organizations or departments, especially in national or global applications. HUSt is a massive storage system that was built
